verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of Jeremiah <WH3414> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah, <WH2518> of <WH4480> the priests <WH3548> that <WH834> were in Anathoth <WH6068> in the land <WH776> of Benjamin: <WH1144>

To whom <WH834> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> in the days <WH3117> of Josiah <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of Amon <WH526> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> in the thirteenth <WH7969> <WH6240> year <WH8141> of his reign. <WH4427>

It came <WH1961> also in the days <WH3117> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> unto <WH5704> the end <WH8552> of the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> year <WH8141> of Zedekiah <WH6667> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> unto <WH5704> the carrying away <WH1540> of Jerusalem <WH3389> captive in the fifth <WH2549> month. <WH2320>
Then the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Before <WH2962> I formed <WH3335> thee in the belly <WH990> I knew <WH3045> thee; and before <WH2962> thou camest forth <WH3318> out of the womb <WH4480> <WH7358> I sanctified <WH6942> thee, and I ordained <WH5414> thee a prophet <WH5030> unto the nations. <WH1471>
Then said <WH559> I, Ah, <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD! <WH3069> behold, <WH2009> I cannot <WH3808> <WH3045> speak: <WH1696> for <WH3588> I <WH595> am a child. <WH5288>

But the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Say <WH559> not, <WH408> I <WH595> am a child: <WH5288> for <WH3588> thou shalt go <WH1980> to <WH5921> all <WH3605> that <WH834> I shall send <WH7971> thee, and whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> I command <WH6680> thee thou shalt speak. <WH1696>
Be not <WH408> afraid <WH3372> of their faces: <WH4480> <WH6440> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am with <WH854> thee to deliver <WH5337> thee, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

Then the LORD <WH3068> put forth <WH7971> <WH853> his hand, <WH3027> and touched <WH5060> <WH5921> my mouth. <WH6310> And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Behold, <WH2009> I have put <WH5414> my words <WH1697> in thy mouth. <WH6310>

See, <WH7200> I have this <WH2088> day <WH3117> set <WH6485> thee over <WH5921> the nations <WH1471> and over <WH5921> the kingdoms, <WH4467> to root out, <WH5428> and to pull down, <WH5422> and to destroy, <WH6> and to throw down, <WH2040> to build, <WH1129> and to plant. <WH5193>

Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559> Jeremiah, <WH3414> what <WH4100> seest <WH7200> thou? <WH859> And I said, <WH559> I <WH589> see <WH7200> a rod <WH4731> of an almond tree. <WH8247>
Then said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> unto <WH413> me, Thou hast well <WH3190> seen: <WH7200> for <WH3588> I <WH589> will hasten <WH8245> <WH5921> my word <WH1697> to perform <WH6213> it.

And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me the second time, <WH8145> saying, <WH559> What <WH4100> seest <WH7200> thou? <WH859> And I said, <WH559> I <WH589> see <WH7200> a seething <WH5301> pot; <WH5518> and the face <WH6440> thereof is toward <WH4480> <WH6440> the north. <WH6828>

Then the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Out of the north <WH4480> <WH6828> an evil <WH7451> shall break forth <WH6605> upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land. <WH776>

For, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> I will call <WH7121> all <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the kingdoms <WH4467> of the north, <WH6828> saith <WH5002> the LORD; <WH3068> and they shall come, <WH935> and they shall set <WH5414> every one <WH376> his throne <WH3678> at the entering <WH6607> of the gates <WH8179> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> the walls <WH2346> thereof round about, <WH5439> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Judah. <WH3063>

And I will utter <WH1696> my judgments <WH4941> against them touching <WH5921> all <WH3605> their wickedness, <WH7451> who <WH834> have forsaken <WH5800> me, and have burned incense <WH6999> unto other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worshiped <WH7812> the works <WH4639> of their own hands. <WH3027>

Thou <WH859> therefore gird up <WH247> thy loins, <WH4975> and arise, <WH6965> and speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> them <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> I <WH595> command <WH6680> thee: be not <WH408> dismayed <WH2865> at their faces, <WH4480> <WH6440> lest <WH6435> I confound <WH2865> thee before <WH6440> them.

For, <WH589> behold, <WH2009> I have made <WH5414> thee this day <WH3117> a defensed <WH4013> city, <WH5892> and an iron <WH1270> pillar, <WH5982> and brazen <WH5178> walls <WH2346> against <WH5921> the whole <WH3605> land, <WH776> against the kings <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> against the princes <WH8269> thereof, against the priests <WH3548> thereof, and against the people <WH5971> of the land. <WH776>

And they shall fight <WH3898> against <WH413> thee; but they shall not <WH3808> prevail <WH3201> against thee; for <WH3588> I <WH589> am with <WH854> thee, saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> to deliver <WH5337> thee.
